headline: The Arctic Group is led by Konstantin Joachim von Mohackel, who has served as Group CEO and Supreme Leader since 2016.
Nici joined The Arctic Group in 2018 to run the London office administration.
Simone is the founding Director of Arctic Marmot.
Andreas is the founding Director of Arctic Bear.

Sau-lin is responsible for the digital security and compliance for The Arctic Group. She has a background in IT security and legal compliance, having worked in the banking and legal sectors in London since 1998. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
